cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.util.settings

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.util.settings.Settings

  • @Repository
 @Scope(value="singleton")
 @Lazy(value=false)
 @PropertySource(value="classpath:resources.properties")
public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    Global settings, load from database and resources.properties. Picture folder path and data folder path is load form resources.properties.
